menu_main:
*🎙️ SpotDL Bot*
Download songs, albums, artists, or playlists directly from Spotify.

📌 *Available commands:*

• /authorize – Authorize the bot to access your Spotify account. Required to download your liked songs or sync your playlists.
• /download – Download a song, album, artist, or playlist using a Spotify URL.
• /downloadsavedsongs – Download all your liked songs in your library.
• /downloadsavedalbums – Download all albums saved in your library.
• /downloadsavedplaylists – Download all playlists saved in your library.
• /downloaduserplaylists – Download all playlists you have created.
• /sync – Sync your Spotify library and remove songs that are no longer in your playlists or albums.
• /version – Show the current bot version.
• /donate – Support development with a donation.

ℹ️ *Tip:* You can also send a Spotify URL directly to download it automatically.

💡 *Need help?* Use /start anytime to return to this menu.
